entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who is disliked by Harry. She is described as 'evil' and 'twisted'.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is another teacher at Hogwarts who Harry dislikes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's and also a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is the dormitory for Gryffindor students at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry dislikes Professor Umbridge, who he thinks is 'evil' and 'twisted'.
